tweets.text: #HS2 has finally applied to @EnvAgency for permission to send TBMs thru Misbourne Valley‚Äôs fractured chalk. We risk losing our chalk streams, Shardeloes Lake & contamination of chalk aquifer, affecting drinking water for millions. Plse email: enquiries@environment-agency.gov.uk

@JamesBevanEA @EnvAgency I pay tribute to the the people of Newcastle under Lyme and all the other landfill communities around the country that you allow to be poisoned while they sleep!! #stopthestink #capitoff

Today we've issued @RedIndustries2 with an enforcement notice outlining the improvement actions they need to take at #WalleysQuarry to comply with their environmental permit 
 
Read more üëâ https://t.co/o558iAVicn
 
#Silverdale #NewcastleUnderLyme https://t.co/atVO15mcNu
@EnvAgencyMids https://t.co/vTeYvxfc9v
@EnvAgencyMids And how was this missed in the inspection only a couple of days ago? Why not do a drone survey if you can't get access to all the perimeter of the site?

Thank you to the community of #Silverdale, Newcastle-under-Lyme for reporting a water pipe discharging near #WalleysQuarry landfill. Our officers are attending the @RedIndustries2 site to investigate.

@EnvAgencyMids, according to the video released by @StinkStopthe, and the subsequent sampling indicating the presence of ammonia, it looks like an uncontrolled release of leachate contaminated material. Please hurry. https://t.co/XC8eddPLfm
@DrMickSalt @EnvAgencyMids @StinkStopthe Child this be the reason my eyes sting and ,run so much?
